titleStmt.title: Gospel-tydings wherein is shewed what the Gospel administration was, the apostacy from it, and the restauration into it again : being a message of true and unfeigned love ... / [by] W.S.
titleStmt.author: Smith, William, d. 1673.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated: W.S., Nottingham County Gaol, the second month, 1663.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
